attributes.action: Families to take one holiday at any point of the year with no charges fromschool
attributes.background: Grant families the opportunity to have one holiday a year that they can choose that’s best for them. Schools can record the one occasion as granted. Any extra holidays should be taken in school holidays

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for a similar action:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/641937
